message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You wanted 50/50, but I think I deserve more for being the better negotiator!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, considering your 'negotiation skills'.
You're getting desperate, I can see that. Time to make a serious offer!
I'm not getting desperate yet, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Don't get too comfortable!
You're getting close to the edge, Alice. I'm not going to go easy on you!
I'm really struggling here, Bob. Please, have a heart and give me a better deal. I'll even throw in a nice dinner at a fancy restaurant!
You're really scraping the bottom of the barrel, Alice. Time to get serious!
I'm not giving up yet, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but please, don't crush me completely!
You're getting close to nothing, Alice. I'm not going to go any higher!
I'm really, really struggling here, Bob. I'll give you the last bit of dignity I have left and accept this offer. Please, don't crush me completely!
You've had your chance, Alice. Take it or leave it. I'm taking the last 1 cent!
